sentences.english: Webcast of the take-off and landing will go live 5 minutes prior to each event.
sentences.chinese: 网上直播的起飞和降落会活5分钟前，每个事件。

sentences.english: This is Tick-Tock McGlaughlin live at Clocker's Corner.
sentences.chinese: 这里是滴答麦考林，在计时之角为你直播。

sentences.english: The measures to solve these problems are to change the sowing afforestation to the planting.
sentences.chinese: 解决的主要办法是改传统的直播造林为植苗造林。

sentences.english: This is then broadcasted live to Google's website.
sentences.chinese: 这是当时现场直播，以谷歌的网站。

sentences.english: Saw the rest several later on live, indeed as expected, you all the way kill into 5 strong.
sentences.chinese: 随后看了余下的几场直播，果然，你一路杀进5强。

sentences.english: ATV will offer real live broadcast matches and highlights for soccer fans to enjoy at home.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲电视将作现场直播及作精华介绍。

sentences.english: He calls this the biggest leap since the original iPhone. See all the images from Monday's event from our live blog here.
sentences.chinese: 你可以从我们的直播博客中看到周一事件的所有照片。

sentences.english: Streaming live video also benefits from a persistent connection.
sentences.chinese: 流式直播视频也从持久连接中获益良多。

sentences.english: The research aimed to study the effects of several herbicides to Juncellus serotinus.
sentences.chinese: 探讨几种药剂防除直播稻田水三棱草的效果。

sentences.english: Li Jianxi says in the brief statement to countrywide TV living broadcast.
sentences.chinese: 李健熙在向全国电视直播的简短声明中说。

sentences.english: A. New broadcast cam is wonderful, we never switched to wide.
sentences.chinese: 全新的直播视角很出色，我们从来没有切换到宽视角。

sentences.english: You can use them with a content stream that's compressed on-the-fly, for example in a live-event broadcast.
sentences.chinese: 也可以用它们传输即时压缩的内容流，例如现场直播。

sentences.english: I wanted the whole process to be shared on the Webcast.
sentences.chinese: 我希望整个写作过程通过网络直播公诸于众。

sentences.english: Is it a live broadcast or a recorded one?
sentences.chinese: 这是现场直播还是录相节目？

sentences.english: It is always a live TV broadcast of spring Festival programme.
sentences.chinese: 春节晚会的节目都是现场直播的。

sentences.english: The Prime Minister of Tunisia Hamadi Jebali has announced his resignation in a live television address.
sentences.chinese: 突尼斯总理杰巴里在电视直播讲话中宣布辞职。
